hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(printf '%s' "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""')

# Block dev servers that aren't run in tmux
if printf '%s' "$cmd" | grep -qE '(npm run dev|pnpm( run)? dev|yarn dev|bun run dev)'; then
  echo '[Hook] BLOCKED: Dev server must run in tmux for log access' >&2
  echo '[Hook] Use this command instead:' >&2
  printf '[Hook] tmux new-session -d -s dev '\''npm run dev'\''\n' >&2
  echo '[Hook] Then: tmux attach -t dev' >&2
  exit 2
fi

# Reminder for long-running commands
if printf '%s' "$cmd" | grep -qE '(npm (install|test)|pnpm (install|test)|yarn (install|test)|bun (install|test)|cargo build|make|docker|pytest|vitest|playwright)'; then
  if [ -z "$TMUX" ]; then
    echo '[Hook] Consider running in tmux for session persistence' >&2
    echo '[Hook] tmux new -s dev  |  tmux attach -t dev' >&2
  fi
fi

# Pause before git push
if printf '%s' "$cmd" | grep -qE 'git push'; then
  echo '[Hook] Review changes before push...' >&2
  echo '[Hook] Press Enter to continue with push or Ctrl+C to abort...' >&2
  read -r
fi

printf '%s' "$input"

PreToolUse.description: Bash command guards: block dev servers outside tmux, remind about tmux, pause before git push

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(printf '%s' "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""')

# Auto-detect PR creation and log useful info
if printf '%s' "$cmd" | grep -qE 'gh pr create'; then
  output=$(printf '%s' "$input" | jq -r '.tool_output.stdout // ""')
  pr_url=$(printf '%s' "$output" | grep -oE 'https://github.com/[^/]+/[^/]+/pull/[0-9]+')
  
  if [ -n "$pr_url" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] PR created: $pr_url" >&2
    echo "[Hook] Checking GitHub Actions status..." >&2
    repo=$(printf '%s' "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|https://github.com/([^/]+/[^/]+)/pull/[0-9]+|\1|')
    pr_num=$(printf '%s' "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|.*/pull/([0-9]+)|\1|')
    echo "[Hook] To review PR: gh pr review $pr_num --repo $repo" >&2
  fi
fi

printf '%s' "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Log PR URL and provide review command after PR creation

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(printf '%s' "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

# Only process JS/TS files
if [[ ! "$file_path" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$ ]]; then
  printf '%s' "$input"
  exit 0
fi

# Auto-format with Prettier
if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  if command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    prettier --write "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -5 >&2
  fi
fi

# TypeScript check for .ts/.tsx files
if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  dir=$(dirname "$file_path")
  project_root="$dir"
  while [ "$project_root" != "/" ] && [ ! -f "$project_root/package.json" ]; do
    project_root=$(dirname "$project_root")
  done
  
  if [ -f "$project_root/tsconfig.json" ]; then
    cd "$project_root" && npx tsc --noEmit --pretty false 2>&1 | grep "$file_path" | head -10 >&2 || true
  fi
fi

# Warn about console.log
if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  console_logs=$(grep -n "console\.log" "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true)
  
  if [ -n "$console_logs" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] WARNING: console.log found in $file_path" >&2
    printf '%s\n' "$console_logs" | head -5 >&2
    echo "[Hook] Remove console.log before committing" >&2
  fi
fi

printf '%s' "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Auto-format, TypeScript check, and console.log warning for JS/TS file edits

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)

if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then
  modified_files=$(git diff --name-only HEAD 2>/dev/null | grep -E '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$' || true)
  
  if [ -n "$modified_files" ]; then
    has_console=false
    while IFS= read -r file; do
      if [ -f "$file" ]; then
        if grep -q "console\.log" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
          echo "[Hook] WARNING: console.log found in $file" >&2
          has_console=true
        fi
      fi
    done <<< "$modified_files"
    
    if [ "$has_console" = true ]; then
      echo "[Hook] Remove console.log statements before committing" >&2
    fi
  fi
fi

printf '%s' "$input"

Stop.description: Final audit for console.log in modified files before session ends
